label: Minor Collision
description: A minor road accident with no serious injuries.

label: Major Collision
description: A major road accident involving serious damage or injuries.

label: Vehicle Rollover
description: An accident where a vehicle tips over onto its side or roof.

label: Hit and Run
description: An accident where the vehicle involved leaves the scene without stopping.

label: Pedestrian Accident
description: An accident involving a vehicle and a pedestrian.
